subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lexi Thompson, who turned pro last year, finished five shots ahead of her closest challenger at the Navistar L.P.G.A. Classic in Prattville, Ala.
snippet: Lexi Thompson, who turned pro last year, finished five shots ahead of her closest challenger at the Navistar L.P.G.A. Classic in Prattville, Ala.
